title: Sarah Roberts flashes diamond ring as she steps out with James Stewart for the Everest Carnival
text:
They tied the knot during a lavish wedding at Luttrellstown Castle in Ireland back in July.

And on Thursday, Home and Away's James Stewart and Sarah Roberts looked every inch the loved-up newlyweds as they attended the Everest Carnival Fashion Lunch in Sydney.

The happy couple posed up a storm on the red carpet, and at one point Sarah flashed her wedding bling as she rested her hands on her husband's chest.

No wonder she's smiling! Newlywed Sarah Roberts flashed her wedding bling as she stepped out with husband and Home and Away co-star, James Stewart, at the Everest Carnival Fashion Lunch in Sydney on Thursday

The brunette beauty stunned in a two-piece yellow off-the-shoulder ensemble that featured unique scalloped frills.

The 34-year-old let her natural beauty shine through minimal makeup, including dark eyeliner, dewy foundation and lipgloss.

She accessorised her look with a bejwelled headpiece and studded earrings, and completed her look in white strappy heels.

So in love! The happy couple posed up a storm on the red carpet, and at one point Sarah flashed her wedding bling as she rested her hands on her husband's chest

Hello sunshine! The brunette beauty stunned in a two-piece yellow off-the-shoulder ensemble that featured unique scalloped frills

Meanwhile, James, 43, looked dapper for the occasion in a navy blue suit and a matching tie.

Last month, it was announced the couple signed on as Australian Turf Club ambassadors this spring.

Ambassador duties: Last month, it was announced the couple signed on as Australian Turf Club ambassadors this spring

The pair first met on the set of Home and Away two years ago, but their professional relationship soon blossomed into a romance.

On July 23, the tied the knot at Luttrellstown Castle on the outskirts of Dublin.

James' seven-year-old daughter Scout, whom he shares with ex-fiancée Jessica Marais, acted as a flower girl for the nuptials.
description: They tied the knot during a lavish wedding at Luttrellstown Castle in Ireland back in July.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
